backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and lead submissions with permission checks using an access-control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of high-level summaries for major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying base foreground/background tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky CTA bar with buttons for booking a trial and WhatsApp contact.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Global footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and StickyMobileCTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/LeadFor: Interactive lead capture form that submits user details via a custom hook and displays success UI with WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/Limited: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/sections/MapEmbe: Embeds a Google Maps iframe inside a styled card using marketing config values.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanCom: Renders feature comparison tables for different membership plans with desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/sections/Trainer: Displays a grid of coach highlight cards using data from the COACHES config.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title and meta description and injects structured JSON-LD data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/social/Testimoni: Carousel component showing user testimonials with ratings and profile details.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Provides centralized branding constants including logo path and company name.
frontend/src/config/coaches.ts: Defines coach interface and exports a list of coaches with specialties and experience.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Holds marketing and location configuration including contact info, maps embed URL, and working hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches all leads from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit a new lead via the actor and refresh the leads list on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, typography, utilities, and custom accent classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and value sections using marketing config and styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/CafePage.tsx: Renders the Caf√© page featuring nutrition concept details and menu categories with styled cards.
Renders the contact and free trial booking page with a lead form, contact details, and embedded map.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React page rendering the marketing homepage with hero, services, testimonials, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Displays gym membership plans with pricing tiers, feature lists, and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Shows detailed fitness program offerings such as strength training and weight loss with descriptions and SEO.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and pending requests for global white text styling.
